column5: Hi Guys - I have not found when the seasons open. My son and brother can go with me, but we must go very early. So we may go to either Ontario or Quebec depending upon what dates work best. Any ideas what we may find as to the fishing? I know we may find some cold weather and maybe snow.Thanks, Ohio fisherman

Ohio Fisherman:Fishing season opening and closing dates for Ontario vary depending on the species and the area. Please see the Map Specific Regulations to determine the fishing seasons for waterbodies in Maps A, B, C, D and E. These are available at: http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/MNR/fishing/ontmap.htmlSee http://www.fapaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/regulations/index.htm for regulations for the province of Quebec.
